thehardtruth

Class Solve

  • java.lang.Object
    • thehardtruth.Solve

  • public class Solve
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a solve.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Solve(double time)
      Creates a solve based on the solve time alone.
      Solve(double time, java.lang.String scramble)
      Creates a solve based on the solve time and the scramble.
      Solve(double time, java.lang.String scramble, java.lang.String comment, boolean isDnf, boolean hasPenalty)
      Creates a solve based on a variety of parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Solve

        public Solve(double time)
        Creates a solve based on the solve time alone.
        Parameters:
        time - The recorded time of the solve.

      • Solve

        public Solve(double time,
             java.lang.String scramble)
        Creates a solve based on the solve time and the scramble.
        Parameters:
        time - The recorded time of the solve.
        scramble - The scramble of the solve.

      • Solve

        public Solve(double time,
             java.lang.String scramble,
             java.lang.String comment,
             boolean isDnf,
             boolean hasPenalty)
        Creates a solve based on a variety of parameters.
        Parameters:
        time - The recorded time of the solve.
        scramble - The scramble of the solve.
        comment - The comments on the solve.
        isDnf - Whether the solve was a DNF.
        hasPenalty - Whether the solve had a penalty (does not alter the solve time automatically).
